articles.author: Sherisse Pham, CNN Business
articles.title: Walmart retreats from Japan by selling most of its stake in Seiyu supermarkets - CNN
articles.description: Walmart is beating a retreat from Japan, giving up on a years-long attempt to crack the country's retail market.

articles.author: Reuters, Mary Kekatos Senior
articles.title: Johnson & Johnson launches large trial for a two-dose version of its coronavirus vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson is launching a 12-month long large-scale trial to test two doses of its experimental COVID-19 vaccine with plans to enroll 30,000 participants worldwide.
articles.content:
